metadata.description: Use 1 - 6 characters for the application name or abbreviation
Use 1 character for the environment abbreviation: 'd' = Dev, 'p' = Production, 's' = Stage, & 't' = Test
Use 2 characters to abbreviate the Azure country (e.g., 'us' for United States or 'ca' for Canada).
Use 1 - 2 characters to abbreviate the Azure location (e.g., 'e' for East US or 'e2' for East US 2).
Use 1 character to abbreviate the web or presentation tier: 'p' = Presentation & 'w' = Web
Use 1 character to abbreviate the business logic tier:  'l' = Logic.
Use 1 character to abbreviate the database tier: 'd' = Database.
